statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_profiles WHERE jsonb_array_length(purchase_history) > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE 'john%';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE name = 'Alice' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_history FROM customer_profiles WHERE purchase_history ->> 'total_purchases' > '100';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM customer_profiles JOIN contact_information ON customer_profiles.customer_id = contact_information.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT contact_id, address, city, state, zip_code FROM contact_information WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE customer_profiles.customer_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_profiles JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id JOIN contact_information ON customer_profiles.customer_id = contact_information.customer_id WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM contact_information WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id FROM campaign_customers ORDER BY campaign_id, customer_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_profiles.full_name, marketing_campaigns.campaign_name FROM customer_profiles JOIN campaign_customers ON customer_profiles.customer_id = campaign_customers.customer_id JOIN marketing_campaigns ON campaign_customers.campaign_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_contacts FROM customer_contacts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_contacts > 2;

SELECT customer_profiles.full_name, customer_contacts.contact_type, customer_contacts.contact_info FROM customer_profiles LEFT JOIN customer_contacts ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_contacts.customer_id;
